theShowman:DefaultUncommonSkill.NAME: A Better Defend
theShowman:DefaultUncommonSkill.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Plated Armor. Affected by Dexterity.

theShowman:DefaultRareSkill.NAME: For Each Loop x2
theShowman:DefaultRareSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 2 times.
theShowman:DefaultRareSkill.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable to all enemies, 3 times.

theShowman:DefaultRarePower.NAME: In-Progress Form
theShowman:DefaultRarePower.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, play a TOUCH.

theShowman:DefaultAttackWithVariable.NAME: Special Strike
theShowman:DefaultAttackWithVariable.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! Damage [E] times. NL (Deal !theShowman:ENERGY_DAMAGE! damage total.)

theShowman:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.NAME: Cool 2 Number Card
theShowman:DefaultSecondMagicNumberSkill.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! vulnerable and !theShowman:SecondMagic! poison to an enemy.

theShowman:StrongArm.NAME: Strong Arm
theShowman:StrongArm.DESCRIPTION: Gain !M! Strength until the end of turn. NL theshowman:Stacked.

theShowman:ExaggeratedArmSweeps.NAME: Exaggerated Arm Sweeps
theShowman:ExaggeratedArmSweeps.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theshowman:Stacked. NL theshowman:Stacked. NL theshowman:Stacked.
theShowman:ExaggeratedArmSweeps.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL theshowman:Stacked. NL theshowman:Stacked.

theShowman:CardPickup52.NAME: 52 Card Pickup
theShowman:CardPickup52.DESCRIPTION: Shuffle !M! random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

theShowman:SleeveStash.NAME: Sleeve Stash
theShowman:SleeveStash.DESCRIPTION: Retain up to !M! cards this turn. NL Draw a card.

theShowman:NowYouSeeMe.NAME: Now You See Me
theShowman:NowYouSeeMe.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a random card in your draw pile.
theShowman:NowYouSeeMe.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust a card in your draw pile.

theShowman:SleightedHand.NAME: Sleighted Hand
theShowman:SleightedHand.DESCRIPTION: Target enemy loses !M! Strength this turn.
theShowman:SleightedHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL enemies lose !M! Strength this turn.

theShowman:FlashyFlourish.NAME: Flashy Flourish
theShowman:FlashyFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When this card is Exhausted, apply 2 Vulnerable to ALL enemies.

theShowman:Prestidigitation.NAME: Prestidigitation
theShowman:Prestidigitation.DESCRIPTION: Draw !M! Cards. NL Exhaust ALL Status and Curse Cards in your hand.

theShowman:NowYouDont.NAME: Now You Don't
theShowman:NowYouDont.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a random card in your draw pile.
theShowman:NowYouDont.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Exhaust a card in your draw pile.

theShowman:RazzleDazzle.NAME: Razzle Dazzle
theShowman:RazzleDazzle.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL Draw a card.

theShowman:WildFlourish.NAME: Wild Flourish
theShowman:WildFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL When this card is Exhausted, deal !D! damage to ALL enemies.

theShowman:AndBehindCurtain.NAME: Behind Curtain #3...
theShowman:AndBehindCurtain.DESCRIPTION: Select a theshowman:Class Card in your Exhaust Pile and add it to your hand. NL Exhaust.
theShowman:AndBehindCurtain.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Select !M! theshowman:Class Cards in your Exhaust Pile and add them to your hand. NL Exhaust.

theShowman:ThreeCardMonty.NAME: Three Card Monty
theShowman:ThreeCardMonty.DESCRIPTION: Draw a card. Add !M! copies of it to your hand.

theShowman:PropManacles.NAME: Prop Manacles
theShowman:PropManacles.DESCRIPTION: Target Enemy loses 1 Strength this turn for each card in your Exhaust Pile.
theShowman:PropManacles.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: ALL Enemies lose 1 Strength this turn for each card in your Exhaust Pile.

theShowman:ForMyNextTrick.NAME: For My Next Trick!
theShowman:ForMyNextTrick.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Next turn, add !M! copies to your hand that cost 1 less that turn. NL Exhaust.

theShowman:IsThisYourCard.NAME: Is THIS Your Card?
theShowman:IsThisYourCard.DESCRIPTION: For each card you have in your exhaust pile, deal !D! damage.

theShowman:StackTheDeck.NAME: Stack The Deck
theShowman:StackTheDeck.DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, put up to !M! card from your hand on top of your draw pile.
theShowman:StackTheDeck.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the end of your turn, put up to !M! cards from your hand on top of your draw pile.

theShowman:ByrdBGone.NAME: Byrd-B-Gone
theShowman:ByrdBGone.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked and don't lose HP, gain !M! Thorns.

theShowman:PotentialUnleashed.NAME: Potential Unleashed
theShowman:PotentialUnleashed.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies. NL Ethereal.
theShowman:PotentialUnleashed.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a card, deal !M! damage to ALL enemies.

theShowman:DivertingDisplay.NAME: Diverting Display
theShowman:DivertingDisplay.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.
theShowman:DivertingDisplay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Whenever you Exhaust a card, apply !M! Vulnerable to a random enemy.

theShowman:SetTheStage.NAME: Set The Stage
theShowman:SetTheStage.DESCRIPTION: Draw until your hand is full.
theShowman:SetTheStage.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Draw until your hand is full. NL Retain any number of cards this turn.

theShowman:VanDeGraaffsRevenge.NAME: Van De Graaff's Revenge
theShowman:VanDeGraaffsRevenge.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Dazed to your hand, draw pile, and discard pile.

theShowman:CrashingLights.NAME: Crashing Lights
theShowman:CrashingLights.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

theShowman:OpenTheCurtain.NAME: Open The Curtain
theShowman:OpenTheCurtain.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Shuffle a Dazed into your draw pile.

theShowman:MirrorMirror.NAME: Encore!
theShowman:MirrorMirror.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Add a copy of the next card you play this turn to your hand.

theShowman:SecondAct.NAME: Second Act
theShowman:SecondAct.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 cards in your hand. NL Gain [E].
theShowman:SecondAct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust 2 cards in your hand. NL Gain [E] [E].

theShowman:SybilFlourish.NAME: Sybil Flourish
theShowman:SybilFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL When this card is Exhausted, gain [E] [E].

theShowman:CurtainCall.NAME: Curtain Call
theShowman:CurtainCall.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card this turn, gain !B! Block. NL Exhaust up to !M! cards in your hand. NL Affected by modifiers to Block.

theShowman:WardrobeWarding.NAME: Wardrobe Warding
theShowman:WardrobeWarding.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Retain up to !M! cards this turn.

theShowman:AGrossDisplay.NAME: A Gross Display
theShowman:AGrossDisplay.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL theshowman:Stacked.
theShowman:AGrossDisplay.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Ethereal. NL Deal !D! damage !M! times. NL theshowman:Stacked.

theShowman:SawnInHalf.NAME: Sawn In Half
theShowman:SawnInHalf.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the target's Strength to 0.
theShowman:SawnInHalf.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Reduce the target's Strength to 0. NL Apply !M! Weak.

theShowman:KnockThePile.NAME: Knock The Pile
theShowman:KnockThePile.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Look at the top !M! cards of your draw pile. NL Exhaust any number of them.

theShowman:DapperFlourish.NAME: Dapper Flourish
theShowman:DapperFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL When this card is Exhausted, gain 1 theshowman:Buffer this turn.

theShowman:UpMySleeve.NAME: Up My Sleeve
theShowman:UpMySleeve.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Return a card from your Exhaust pile to your hand.

theShowman:PropShow.NAME: Prop Show
theShowman:PropShow.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Draw !M! cards. NL theshowman:Improvise.

theShowman:WhirlingDervish.NAME: Whirling Dervish
theShowman:WhirlingDervish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies X times. NL theshowman:Stacked.

theShowman:Stupefy.NAME: Stupefy
theShowman:Stupefy.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Add !M! Dazed to your hand.

theShowman:FistFullOfCards.NAME: Fist Full Of Cards
theShowman:FistFullOfCards.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage for each card in your hand.

theShowman:VanishingAct.NAME: Vanishing Act
theShowman:VanishingAct.DESCRIPTION: Remove a card from your hand and your deck. NL Fleeting.
theShowman:VanishingAct.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Remove 2 cards from your hand and your deck. NL Fleeting.

theShowman:WillingVolunteer.NAME: Willing Volunteer
theShowman:WillingVolunteer.DESCRIPTION: The first attack that would hit you during the enemy's turn hits the targeted enemy instead. NL Lasts until the start of your next turn.
theShowman:WillingVolunteer.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: The first two attacks that would hit you during the enemy's turn hits the targeted enemy instead. NL Lasts until the start of your next turn.

theShowman:MaximumDistraction.NAME: Maximum Distraction
theShowman:MaximumDistraction.DESCRIPTION: For every !M! stacks of Vulnerable an enemy has, they take an additional 25% damage.

theShowman:NothingInMyHands.NAME: Begone Thought
theShowman:NothingInMyHands.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand instead of discarding it.
theShowman:NothingInMyHands.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL At the end of your turn, Exhaust your hand instead of discarding it. NL Then create and Exhaust a Daze for each card.

theShowman:ThrowingCards.NAME: Throwing Cards
theShowman:ThrowingCards.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, deal !M! damage to a random enemy.

theShowman:Toro.NAME: Toro!
theShowman:Toro.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you are attacked, apply !M! Vulnerable to the attacker.

theShowman:BlackJack.NAME: Black Jack
theShowman:BlackJack.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage !theShowman:SecondMagic! times. NL theshowman:Stacked. NL ( theshowman:Stacked only reduces damage on this card.)

theShowman:OneUp.NAME: One-Up
theShowman:OneUp.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If the enemy is Vulnerable, draw !M! cards.

theShowman:Columbify.NAME: Columbify
theShowman:Columbify.DESCRIPTION: Replace an enemy with a Byrd this turn.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: I can't Columbify a Columbified monster

theShowman:Showstopper.NAME: Showstopper
theShowman:Showstopper.DESCRIPTION: Replay in a random order, ALL theshowman:Class cards in your Exhaust pile. NL Purge.
theShowman:Showstopper.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replay in a random order, ALL theshowman:Class cards in your Exhaust pile. NL Purge.

theShowman:ItsShowtime.NAME: It's Showtime
theShowman:ItsShowtime.DESCRIPTION: Replay X random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile.
theShowman:ItsShowtime.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Replay X+1 random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile.

theShowman:BaitedBreath.NAME: Baited Breath
theShowman:BaitedBreath.DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to target enemy's Vulnerable.
theShowman:BaitedBreath.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Gain Block equal to ALL enemy's Vulnerable.

theShowman:GrandGambit.NAME: Grand Gambit
theShowman:GrandGambit.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. NL Draw that many cards. NL Exhaust.
theShowman:GrandGambit.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust any number of cards in your hand. NL Draw that many cards +1. NL Exhaust.

theShowman:ObjectPermanence.NAME: Object Permanence
theShowman:ObjectPermanence.DESCRIPTION: ALL theshowman:temporary effects become permanent for this combat. NL Purge.

theShowman:BottomDoubleDeal.NAME: Bottom Deal
theShowman:BottomDoubleDeal.DESCRIPTION: Put a Skill or Attack from your draw pile into your hand.
theShowman:BottomDoubleDeal.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Put a Skill AND Attack from your draw pile into your hand.

theShowman:Presto.NAME: Presto!
theShowman:Presto.DESCRIPTION: Put a random non-Status, non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile into your hand. NL It costs 0 this turn.

theShowman:SubtleMisdirections.NAME: Subtle Misdirections
theShowman:SubtleMisdirections.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status for the first time in a turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.
theShowman:SubtleMisdirections.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you draw a Status for the first two times in a turn, Exhaust it and draw a card.

theShowman:RaptMisdirection.NAME: Juxtaposed Juggling
theShowman:RaptMisdirection.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Vulnerability stacks additively for this attack.

theShowman:ReappearingTrick.NAME: Reappearing Trick
theShowman:ReappearingTrick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Shuffle ALL non-Curse, non-Status cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

theShowman:MischiefManaged.NAME: Mischief Managed
theShowman:MischiefManaged.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL If this deals unblocked damage to a Vulnerable enemy, gain temporary Strength next turn equal to that enemy's Vulnerable.

theShowman:KiblerFlick.NAME: Kibler Flick
theShowman:KiblerFlick.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. Apply that much Vulnerable

theShowman:SpeechCard.NAME: Ladies and Gentlemen...
theShowman:SpeechCard.DESCRIPTION: Make a speech. NL Draw a card. NL theshowman:Improvise. NL Innate. NL Fleeting.
theShowman:SpeechCard.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Make a speech. NL Draw a card. NL theshowman:Improvise. NL Innate. NL Exhaust.
EXTENDED_DESCRIPTION: This is no Jedi trick! This is

theShowman:SleightedFlourish.NAME: Sleighted Flourish
theShowman:SleightedFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Apply !M! Vulnerable. NL When this card is Exhausted, shuffle it and !theShowman:SecondMagic! random theshowman:Class cards from your Exhaust pile into your draw pile.

theShowman:SleeveAces.NAME: Sleeve Aces
theShowman:SleeveAces.DESCRIPTION: Add a copy of a non-Status, non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile to your discard pile and draw pile. NL Exhaust.
theShowman:SleeveAces.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Add !M! copies of a non-Status, non-Curse card from your Exhaust pile to your discard pile and draw pile. NL Exhaust.

theShowman:PerfectedPerformance.NAME: Perfected Performance
theShowman:PerfectedPerformance.DESCRIPTION: The first !M! cards you draw each turn theshowman:Improvise.

theShowman:ThespianForm.NAME: Thespian Form
theShowman:ThespianForm.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, ALL on-Exhaust effects trigger !M! additional time.
theShowman:ThespianForm.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, ALL on-Exhaust effects trigger !M! additional times.

theShowman:StageHook.NAME: Stage Hook
theShowman:StageHook.DESCRIPTION: Gain !B! Block. NL Deal !D! damage. NL theshowman:Stacked.

theShowman:TroublingTrope.NAME: Troubling Trope
theShowman:TroublingTrope.DESCRIPTION: Innate. NL Autoplay. NL Deal !D! damage to ALL enemies. NL Increase this card's damage by !M! this combat. NL Shuffle this card into your draw pile.

theShowman:DisembodiedHand.NAME: Disembodied Hand
theShowman:DisembodiedHand.DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a random card in your hand. NL Play it at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.
theShowman:DisembodiedHand.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Exhaust a card in your hand. NL Play it at the start of your next turn. NL Exhaust.

theShowman:ParadigmPerformance.NAME: Paradigm Sift
theShowman:ParadigmPerformance.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E]. NL Exhaust your draw pile and shuffle your Exhaust pile into your draw pile simultaneously. NL Exhaust.
theShowman:ParadigmPerformance.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Gain [E] [E]. NL Exhaust your draw pile and shuffle your Exhaust pile into your draw pile simultaneously. NL Exhaust.

theShowman:ImpromptuFlourish.NAME: Impromptu Flourish
theShowman:ImpromptuFlourish.DESCRIPTION: Deal !D! damage. NL Draw a card. NL theshowman:Improvise. NL When you Exhaust this card, gain !B! Block and draw a card. NL theshowman:Improvise.

theShowman:Ventriloquism.NAME: Ventriloquism
theShowman:Ventriloquism.DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, pick a random card in your Exhaust and draw pile. NL When you play one for the first time this turn, play a copy of the other.
theShowman:Ventriloquism.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: At the start of your turn, pick a random card in your Exhaust and draw pile. NL When you play one this turn, play a copy of the other.

theShowman:ShowOfStrength.NAME: Show Of Strength
theShowman:ShowOfStrength.DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, at the start of next turn, gain !M! Strength until end of turn.
theShowman:ShowOfStrength.UPGRADE_DESCRIPTION: Whenever you Exhaust a card, gain !theShowman:SecondMagic! Strength until end of turn and at the start of next turn, gain !M! Strength until end of turn.
